description: This file is a Python script that sets up and runs a retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) agent using a PostgreSQL vector database with pgvector, along with various components like an embedder, knowledge base, and language model. It includes instructions for starting the database, installing dependencies, and executing the script to query a knowledge base of recipes.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing the conversational agent that interacts with the knowledge base and language model.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: A class for creating text embeddings using OpenAI's models.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for creating a knowledge base from PDFs accessible via URLs.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing the OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for interfacing with a PostgreSQL vector database using pgvector.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: An enumeration for specifying the type of search (e.g., hybrid) in the vector database.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally updating existing entries.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a user query, optionally streaming the output.
